archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0733
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a simple business customer when I use Vodafone for personal use too, I want to view/manage all of my products and services in the same app/portal, so that I have a simple experience and is easy to have an overview of all my product and services

properties.value: Requirement clear. To be discussed if this should be realized by switching context in the app (current working assumption).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
